title: 怎样做到用鱼竿将实体拉到自己的位置
author: AppleCarrot
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AppleCarrot 于 2020-7-28 23:38 编辑 

我看到某一些服务器的钓鱼竿就有把人直接拉向自己的位置的
版本是最新版本

replies.author: renyunzhong
replies.txt_content:
循环接连锁
/execute as @a unless score @s UUID matches -2147483648..2147483647 store result score @s UUID run data get entity @s UUID[0]
/execute at @a[scores={fishing=1..}] as @e[type=fishing_bobber,limit=1,sort=nearest] run scoreboard players operation @s UUID = @p[scores={fishing=1..}] UUID
/execute at @e[type=fishing_bobber,scores={UUID=-2147483648..2147483647}] positioned ~-0.2 ~-0.2 ~-0.2 as @e[type=!fishing_bobber,dx=0] positioned ~-0.6 ~-0.6 ~-0.6 if entity @e[type=!fishing_bobber,dx=0] run scoreboard players operation @s UUID = @e[type=fishing_bobber,limit=1,sort=nearest] UUID
/tag @e[type=!player,type=!fishing_bobber,scores={UUID=-2147483648..2147483647}] add hooked
/execute as @e[type=!fishing_bobber,tag=hooked,scores={UUID=-2147483648..2147483647}] at @s unless entity @e[type=fishing_bobber,distance=..2] at @a if score @p UUID = @s UUID run tp @s ~ ~ ~
scoreboard players set @a fishing 0
/execute as @e[tag=hooked] at @s at @a[distance=..3] if score @p UUID = @s UUID run scoreboard players reset @s UUID
/execute as @e[tag=hooked] at @s at @a[distance=..3] run tag @s remove hooked复制代码
